translations.text: We sent Noah to his people (and directed him): “Warn your people before a grievous chastisement<sup foot_note="182316">1</sup> comes upon them.”
Noah said: “My people, I have certainly been sent as a clear warner to you,
that you serve Allah and fear Him, and follow me;<sup foot_note="182317">1</sup>

He will forgive your sins<sup foot_note="182318">1</sup> and will grant you respite until an appointed term.<sup foot_note="182319">2</sup> Indeed when Allah's appointed term comes, it cannot be deferred;<sup foot_note="182320">3</sup> if you only knew!”<sup foot_note="182321">4</sup>
He said:<sup foot_note="182322">1</sup> “My Lord, I called my people by night and by day,
but the more I called, the farther they fled.<sup foot_note="182323">1</sup>

And every time I called them so that You might forgive them,<sup foot_note="182324">1</sup> they thrust their fingers into their ears and wrapped up their faces with their garments<sup foot_note="182325">2</sup> and obstinately clung to their attitude, and waxed very proud.<sup foot_note="182326">3</sup>
Then I summoned them openly,
and preached to them in public, and also addressed them in secret.
I said to them: “Ask forgiveness from your Lord; surely He is Most Forgiving.
He will shower upon you torrents from heaven,
and will provide you with wealth and children, and will bestow upon you gardens and rivers.<sup foot_note="182327">1</sup>
What is amiss with you that you do not look forward to the majesty of Allah<sup foot_note="182328">1</sup>
when He has created you in stages?<sup foot_note="182329">1</sup>
Do you not see how Allah has created seven heavens, one upon the other,
and has placed the moon in them as a light, and the sun as a radiant lamp?
And Allah has caused you to grow out of the earth so wondrously,<sup foot_note="182330">1</sup>
and He will later cause you to return to it and will then again bring you out of it.
Allah has made the earth a wide expanse for you
so that you may tread its spacious paths.”
Noah said: “My Lord, they did not pay heed to what I said, and followed those (nobles) whose possession of wealth and children has led them to an even greater loss.
They contrived a plot of great magnitude.<sup foot_note="182331">1</sup>
They said: “Do not abandon your deities; do not abandon Wadd, nor Suwa, nor Yaghuth, nor Yauq, nor Nasr.<sup foot_note="182332">1</sup>
They have misled many. So do not enable these evildoers to increase in anything except straying (from the Right Way).”<sup foot_note="182333">1</sup>

And so they were drowned on account of their sins, and then cast into the Fire,<sup foot_note="182334">1</sup> and did not find any other than Allah,<sup foot_note="182335">2</sup> to come forth to their help.
Noah said: “My Lord, do not leave out of these unbelievers even a single dweller on earth,
for certainly if You should leave them (alive), they will mislead Your servants, and will beget none but sinners and utter unbelievers.
My Lord, forgive me and my parents, and whoever enters my house as a believer, and forgive all believers, both men and women, and do not increase the wrong-doers in anything except perdition.”
